Package xdi2.core.util

Utility classes.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CopyUtil.CopyStrategy  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CloneUtil
    Various utility methods for cloning graph components.
    CopyUtil
    Various utility methods for copying statements between graphs.
    CopyUtil.AbstractCopyStrategy
    Just copy everything without change.
    CopyUtil.AllCopyStrategy
    The default strategy that copies everything.
    CopyUtil.CompoundCopyStrategy
    A compound strategy.
    CopyUtil.ReplaceEscapedVariablesCopyStrategy
    A strategy for replacing escaped variables.
    CopyUtil.ReplaceLiteralVariablesCopyStrategy
    A strategy for replacing literal variables.
    CopyUtil.ReplaceRegexLiteralStringCopyStrategy
    A strategy that replaces literal strings.
    CopyUtil.ReplaceXDIAddressCopyStrategy
    A strategy that replaces XDI addresses.
    GraphUtil
    Various utility methods for working with context nodes, relations and literals.
    XDIAddressUtil
    Various utility methods for working with XDI addresses.
    XDIStatementUtil
    Various utility methods for working with statements.
    XRI2Util
    Various utility methods for working with XRI 2.0 syntax.

Package xdi2.core.util Description

Utility classes.
